title: Enchantment spells

properties.name: description
properties.value: Enchant spells use cosmic runes to give an item new properties. For the enchant orb group of spells, a player needs to travel to the appropriate Obelisk and cast the spell on that. Similarly with the jewellery spells, the player must have a piece of jewellery to cast the spell on.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Enchantment
"Enchanted" redirects here. For the suffix, see (e). However, for the magic robes, see Enchanted robes.

Enchant spells use cosmic runes to give an item new properties. For the enchant orb group of spells, a player needs to travel to the appropriate Obelisk and cast the spell on that. Similarly with the jewellery spells, the player must have a piece of jewellery to cast the spell on.

Content in italics denote members only content.

Icon Mobile
icon 		Spell level Runes Experience Description
Enchant Crossbow Bolt 4 Varies Varies Enchants any type of tipped bolts, up to level 87 Magic required.
Lvl-1 Enchant 7 1 1 17.5 Enchants sapphire and opal jewellery.
Lvl-2 Enchant 27 3 1 37 Enchants emerald and jade jewellery.
Lvl-3 Enchant 49 5 1 59 Enchants ruby and topaz jewellery.
Charge Water Orb 56 30 3 1 56 Creates a water orb, spell must be cast on the Obelisk of Water on an island accessible from Taverley Dungeon.
Lvl-4 Enchant 57 10 1 67 Enchants diamond jewellery.
Charge Earth Orb 60 30 3 1 70 Creates an earth orb, spell must be cast on the Obelisk of Earth in Edgeville Dungeon.
Charge Fire Orb 63 30 3 1 73 Creates a fire orb, spell must be cast on the Obelisk of Fire deep in the Taverley Dungeon.
Charge Air Orb 66 30 3 1 76 Creates an air orb, spell must be cast on the Obelisk of Air on the plateau accessible from Edgeville Dungeon.
Lvl-5 Enchant 68 15 15 1 78 Enchants dragonstone jewellery.
Lvl-6 Enchant 87 20 20 1 97 Enchants onyx jewellery.
Lvl-7 Enchant 93 20 1 20 110 Enchants zenyte jewellery.

Contents

  • 1 Enchanted gold and silver jewellery
  • 2 Enchanting crossbow bolts
  • 3 Charging orbs
  • 4 Changes
  • 5 See also

Enchanted gold and silver jewellery[edit | edit source]

Gold and silver jewellery are made with the Crafting skill.

Spell Magic Level Jewellery class Enchanted Result
Ring Necklace Bracelet Amulet
Lvl-1 Enchant 7 Sapphire Ring of recoil Games necklace Bracelet of clay Amulet of magic
Opal Ring of pursuit Dodgy necklace Expeditious bracelet Amulet of bounty
Lvl-2 Enchant 27 Emerald Ring of dueling Binding necklace Castle wars bracelet Amulet of defence or Amulet of nature
Jade Ring of returning Necklace of passage Flamtaer bracelet Amulet of chemistry
Lvl-3 Enchant 49 Ruby Ring of forging Digsite pendant Inoculation bracelet Amulet of strength
Topaz Efaritay's aid Necklace of faith Bracelet of slaughter Burning amulet
Lvl-4 Enchant 57 Diamond Ring of life Phoenix necklace Abyssal bracelet Amulet of power
Lvl-5 Enchant 68 Dragonstone Ring of wealth Skills necklace Combat bracelet Amulet of glory
Lvl-6 Enchant 87 Onyx Ring of stone Berserker necklace Regen bracelet Amulet of fury
Lvl-7 Enchant 93 Zenyte Ring of suffering Necklace of anguish Tormented bracelet Amulet of torture

Enchanting crossbow bolts[edit | edit source]

Gem-tipped crossbow bolts can be enchanted starting at level 4, with stronger bolts requiring higher levels.

Spell Bolts created Magic Level Runes Required Experience Effect
Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Opal) Opal bolts (e) or Opal dragon bolts (e) 4 2 1 9 Lucky Lightning: Extra damage
Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Sapphire) Sapphire bolts (e) or Sapphire dragon bolts (e) 7 1 1 1 17 Clear Mind: Prayer siphon
Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Jade) Jade bolts (e) or Jade dragon bolts (e) 14 2 1 19 Earth's Fury: Opponent knockdown
Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Pearl) Pearl bolts (e) or Pearl dragon bolts (e) 24 2 1 29 Sea Curse: Extra (water-based) damage
Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Emerald) Emerald bolts (e) or Emerald dragon bolts (e) 27 3 1 1 37 Magical Poison: Greater chance of poison
Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Red Topaz) Topaz bolts (e) or Topaz dragon bolts (e) 29 2 1 33 Down to Earth: Lowers target's Magic (other players only)
Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Ruby) Ruby bolts (e) or Ruby dragon bolts (e) 49 5 1 1 59 Blood Forfeit: -10% HP from self, -20% from target
Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Diamond) Diamond bolts (e) or Diamond dragon bolts (e) 57 10 1 2 67 Armour Piercing: Ignore most of target's ranged defence
Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Dragonstone) Dragonstone bolts (e) or Dragonstone dragon bolts (e) 68 15 1 1 78 Dragon's Breath: Dragonbreath damage
Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Onyx) Onyx bolts (e) or Onyx dragon bolts (e) 87 20 1 1 97 Life Leech: Extra damage, HP siphon

Charging orbs[edit | edit source]

Charging orbs requires players to go to an elemental obelisk at a specific location to infuse glass orbs with the obelisk's elemental power, which can then be used to make elemental battlestaves.

Icon Spell Magic Level Runes Required Experience Notes
Charge Water Orb 56 30 3 1 56 Creates a water orb, spell must be cast on the Obelisk of Water on an island accessible from Taverley Dungeon.
Charge Earth Orb 60 30 3 1 70 Creates an earth orb, spell must be cast on the Obelisk of Earth in Edgeville Dungeon.
Charge Fire Orb 63 30 3 1 73 Creates a fire orb, spell must be cast on the Obelisk of Fire deep in Taverley Dungeon.
Charge Air Orb 66 30 3 1 76 Creates an air orb, spell must be cast on the Obelisk of Air on the plateau accessible from Edgeville Dungeon.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 August 2014
(update | poll)

Superheat and enchant jewellery spells will now queue up one spell if you cast them too quickly.

See also[edit | edit source]

See also: Calculator:Enchantment
